title: How the hell did this matchup happen?
body:
I was on the losing side of this matchup - we have 3 level 20s, a level 30, and a silver II player. 

How did we get matched up against this beast? (2 Silvers, 1 gold AND 1  PLATINUM)? Is there something broken with the matching system?

See attachment, or link here: http://snag.gy/XmtEg.jpg

replies.body:
let me put something into perspective for you...

btw, Sup nunu(me) and AP MF out BaseRaced trynd, vayne, zed and janna

At least this matchup looks fair - of the 10 players, based on rankings alone, one team had the best 3 and the worst 2, and the other team had the middle 5.

In my example, one team had the best 3 players AND the 5th best player, and the worst 4 were on the other team.
What the hell have you been smoking this matchup doesn't look fair in the slightest, the Challenger alone is enough to solo carry that game.
Given the guy posting it said it came down to a base race, it sounds like it was quite a close game.
I think the challenger is being cocky though........
Take it as an opportunity to learn. If it makes you feel any better, they were all boosted by me.

It was an absolute thrashing - there wasn't much to learn - their Vayne was just levels above my Ashe. It felt like I was just constantly under the pump. At some point, surely it becomes so unfair it makes you worse rather than better.

By the way, what do you mean they were boosted by you?
When somebody is boosted, they're a zero skill scrublord. I was joking when I meant I boosted them.

Had worse, much worse for example i got matched with two other unrankeds a gold and a silver, what did they have you ask? A Master, two Diamonds and a Plat, now does this sound fair to you? This account may be a smurf and i may have beaten them all because, well, not to sound like an ass i'm just a better player than all of them but that's besides the point.

Normal MMR is different from ranked MMR which is the cause of such bad matchmaking, for example my main i usually just mess around in normals and have fun so you would expect it to have low MMR whereas my rank is, lets just say its really high, matchmaking does need improving but i think what most people want is to make ranked MMR the same as normals MMR and that really isn't the answer.
my normals mmr is higher than my ranked... and i dont play ranked much.
People in your games were smurfs and most likely picked 'veteran or expert' when starting up the new account.
Normal MMR is different from Ranked, a lot of high elo players actually have low normal MMR.
